title: FileAid (1.0) for iPhone & iPod Touch (cracked.ipa + cracked.app
description:
************
What is FileAid and DiskAid and what can I do with this ?

You can send files to your iPhone using DiskAid by the USB cable. 
Then you can view files uploaded on your iPhone using FileAid.
FileAid is also a FTP server for your device and you can send files wirelessly.


- http://www.digidna.net/fileaid
- http://www.digidna.net/diskaid


************
Package contains :

- FileAid.ipa (1.0)
- FileAid.app (1.0)
- DiskAid PC Windows (2.0)
- DiskAid Mac OSX	(1.5)


************
Files formats supported by FileAid :

- Images (JPG, PNG, GIF, TIFF and other)
- PDF
- Office (Word, Excel and PowerPoint)
- iWork (Pages, Numbers and Keynotes)
- Plain Text and RTF (Rich Text Format)
- Audio (MP3 VBR, AAC, Audible, Apple Lossless, AIFF, WAV, CAF)
- Video (standard iPhone formats : H.264, MPEG-4, 3GPP)
- Web Archives
- HTML files.
 

************
How to install ?

1. Install DiskAid on your PC or Mac
2. Install FileAid on your iPhone or Touch
(If you dont know how to install FileAid,check out :
http://www.iphonedownloadblog.com/mobileinstallation-for-iphone/ and then :
http://www.iphonedownloadblog.com/how-to-add-ipa-apps-to-your-iphone/)

3. If you are on Mac, create a folder /DCIM/DiskAid and then upload in this folder files you want to view on your iPhone.
On PC no problem, this folder is created automaticaly with DiskAid 2.0. I hope the next mac version will add this new function.


Enjoy !

Tazup
